summary: A wife pressures her husband to solicit work papers from his civil servant father.
cast: Jean-Pierre Bacri|Kristin Scott Thomas|Isabelle Carré|Marin Orcand Tourrès|Claude Rich|Arthur Igual|Jackie Berroyer|Jérôme Beaujour|Philippe Duclos|Benoît Jacquot|Masahiro Kashiwagi|Iliana Lolic|Francis Leplay|Joséphine Derenne|Agathe Bonitzer|Francis Veron|Georges Martin-Censier|Stanislas Stanic|Jean-Laurent Bourel|Angeli Hucher de Barros|David Ravet
title: Cherchez Hortense
